articles.title: Australian killer's father reveals why son targeted women during deadly stabbing at Sydney mall - Fox News
articles.description: The father of the man who went on a deadly stabbing spree at a busy Australian shopping mall shared why the attack specifically targeted women.
articles.content:
The father of an Australian man who went on a deadly stabbing spree at a busy Sydney shopping mall on Saturday has a theory as to why the attack targeted women while mostly avoiding men.

articles.title: “Ghostly” – Scientists Discover Mysterious Creature From the Shadows in Australia - SciTechDaily

articles.content: In Australia’s Pilbara region, a new ant species, Leptanilla voldemort, has been discovered. It is characterized by its pale, slender form and underground habitat, shedding light on the unique biodiv… [+4732 chars]

articles.title: Drowned land off Australia was an Aboriginal hotspot in last ice age, 4000 stone artifacts reveal - Livescience.com
articles.description: The landscape features in the dreamtime stories of Australia's Indigenous people.
articles.content:
An analysis of over 4,000 stone artifacts discovered on an island off northwestern Australia provides a snapshot of Aboriginal life tens of thousands of years ago.
